item.title: Dead fox, 15th August
item.description:
This was reported 14/08/25 in the morning by caretaker and was informed would be removed within 24hrs. This timescale ran out This am. There are flies now all around this in the communal grounds WHY has this not been removed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bostall Hill, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Abandoned car, 15th August

Car has been packed up and not moved for 2 months, knocked and asked neighbors if it's their car, but no one knows who's car it is.

item.title: Flytipping, 15th August
item.description:
Fly tipping of rubbish including black sacks, a metal seat other other items at the rear of 6 Lakeside Close This footway leads to the park. This was reported previously ref 8007397 and notes added state that this is private land but resident disagrees and wants these items collected urgently. She also said opposite her house at the front there is a black sack that has been there for a while and also needs removing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lakeside Close, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass on the street from smashed car window, 15th August
item.description:
Lots of broken glass on the street, outside 2a Adolphus Road and opposite number 19

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adolphus Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin bags and carton boxes being dropped in front of the restaurant., 15th August
item.description:
1. The bin bags and carton boxes are found every morning in front on the entry of the restaurant YAUATCHA. The rubbish and unpleasant odour expands and comes into restaurant and lingers create both a bad atmosphere and aroma which effects the staff and guest experience. The cleaning service is coming in the late afternoon and removes the bags however whatever debris is remaining on the ground is being left. We would kindly ask to move the rubbish dropping spot to the other side of the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadwick Street, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low branch across footpath, plus a number of dead branches higher up, 15th August
item.description:
Outside 82 Forster Rd the cherry tree has been declining in health over the past 5 years or so. There are a number of large dead branches over hanging the road were cars park and one long low growing large branch which you can hit your head on very easily.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Forster Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden plank loose, 15th August

item.title: Overgrown bushes & trees needs to be cut down by the dyke, 15th August
item.description:
Resident reporting there is overgrown hedges, bushes & trees that need to be cut down all this has overgrown onto the pavement and is a danger for public & wheelchair users and prams as they have to step into the road to walk up. Please could someone look into this asap. It was last cut back about 6 months ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fendyke Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rough sleeper on Common, 15th August
item.description:
There has been a man rough sleeping on the Common for several days which must be very unsafe for him in terms of his health and his safety. Does the Council have any agency that can check on him and make sure he is getting the proper attention he needs please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): School Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sandwich-board in the middle of corner pavement at Graces 242 High Street Beckenham, 15th August
item.description:
I have given details of the obstruction to the pavement outside Graces 242 High Street. I do not know why your system has suddenly brought up this page about pothole???

item.title: Littered and has overgrown with weeds, 15th August
item.description:
The communal green area in front of the Highline building at 10 Steedman Street London SE17 3AF is currently littered and has overgrown with weeds. Would it be possible to arrange for it to be cleaned up? This has been like this one year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Unit 103, Steedman Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
